name: notes-making-app
description: Note-vault is a full-stack note-making app built using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js). It allows users to create, update, and delete notes in real-time. All notes are stored in a database and reflect instantly on the UI. This project is ideal for practicing CRUD operations and full-stack integration.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
